GamePlayer  0.1.0
A game player for two-player perfect information games, implemented using a min-max game tree

GamePlayer::GameTree Class Reference

A game tree search implementation using min-max strategy, alpha-beta pruning, and a transposition table. More...

Detailed Description

A game tree search implementation using min-max strategy, alpha-beta pruning, and a transposition table.

Constructor.

Parameters
ttA transposition table to be used in a search. The table is assumed to be persistent.
sefThe static evaluation function
maxDepthThe maximum number of plies to search
